meanings.definition: A skilled worker who makes things by hand.
meanings.sent1: The craftsperson carefully carved a wooden figurine.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is a talented craftsperson who creates beautiful pottery.
meanings.sent3: The craftsperson joked that their fingers were tired from all the intricate work.
meanings.sent4: Watching the craftsperson at work was like witnessing magic unfold.
meanings.sent5: The craftsperson's creations were so detailed, they seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in a particular craft or trade.
meanings.sent1: The craftsperson demonstrated their expertise in woodworking.
meanings.sent2: She is a craftsperson in the art of glassblowing.
meanings.sent3: The craftsperson proudly displayed their collection of handmade tools.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, the craftsperson is a master of their domain.
meanings.sent5: The craftsperson's dedication to their craft is truly inspiring.
